rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BMA1012, HSC1300}

description: This unit uses the framework of human development to examine health throughout the lifespan. Physical, cognitive, emotional, behavioural and psychosocial development, and the impact of culture on health will be examined. Students will investigate the roles of allied health professionals in assessing and maintaining health across the lifespan.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
